Name: EPIQ Systems, Inc
Description: DELISTED - Epiq Systems, Inc., is a provider of integrated technology-enabled solutions for electronic discovery, bankruptcy and class action settlement administration.. The Company's solutions streamline the administration of bankruptcy, litigation, financial transactions and regulatory compliance matters. It offers technology solutions for e-discovery, document review, legal notification, claims administration and controlled disbursement of funds. The Company's clients include law firms, corporate legal departments, bankruptcy trustees, Government agencies, mortgage processors, financial institutions, and other professional advisors who require technology, responsive service and subject-matter. It has three segments: eDiscovery, bankruptcy and settlement administration.
